mapper.select: select `id`,`type`,`for_names`,`for_ids`,`title`,`url`,`is_disabled`, `details`,`browse_num`,`add_time`,date_format(add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as addTime1, `update_time`,`delete_flag` from t_consult where id = #{value}

select distinct tc.id, tc.title, date_format(tc.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as addTime, tc.url from t_consult tc,t_consult_plot tcp,t_user_plot tup where tc.id = tcp.consult_id and tcp.plot_id = tup.plot_id and tc.type = #{type} and tc.is_disabled = 0 and tup.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tc.add_time DESC
